1534537059_1Kh3qLdTH2QKewUb6cWZa2dMveMT5.body:
> [vaerospace](#comment_1_1Kh3qLdTH2QKewUb6cWZa2dMveMT5EcVer): how to "sticky"

Hi, try to open [ZeroHello](/) and into "Search in connected sites" field paste:
sticky zerotalk clone site:zerotalk

Also your site has low/default limit on user submitted content, to give users more room (to add more texts), you can edit ZeroNet\data\1JfC6xjYNkM4UdzJRMKbrywM5ugKdPAo8V\data\users\content.json and replace 20000 by lets say 2000000.

> [vaerospace](#comment_6_1Kh3qLdTH2QKewUb6cWZa2dMveMT5EcVer): upped the data to 200k should be plenty for now :) Ta again for the advice :)

nice you found it :), though in my case i still see the limit: used: 2.3k/20k under the text area for leaving a comment here.

After modifying content.json, you need to open your site (0) menu (move button in right top corner to the left) and click "Sign and publish" button. That way you publish your changes to other people.

1534629849_1Kh3qLdTH2QKewUb6cWZa2dMveMT5.body: somehow it shows index of videos, not any particular video. try http://127.0.0.1:43110/big.kopykate.bit

> [vaerospace](#comment_13_1Kh3qLdTH2QKewUb6cWZa2dMveMT5EcVer): how do I change favicon.ico for this site , I'm stumped

Check site that has custom favicon, example [NetTalk](/1LfvE91ZF18jdG3wW62Dw7NtfTZh737KPL) when you open its (0) menu and then click to Open site directory, open content.json you can see:
 "favicon": "img/favicon.ico",
As usual, you will need to Sign and publish after making changes in your files. I hope it will work for you..
